title: Medium Lesson 1: Functions in Dart
paragraph: Functions in Dart allow you to organize code into reusable blocks. A function can take parameters and return a value. Dart also supports optional parameters, named parameters, and arrow functions for short syntax. Named parameters make your function calls more readable, while optional parameters allow you to call a function with fewer arguments.
question: Which symbol is used to create a short 'arrow function' in Dart?
